extendedInfo.description: Flashcards with absolute MUST KNOW points of the CFAÂ® Level 2 curriculum.This application is designed to act as a revision aid for your CFA Level 2 exam. It lists over 400 commonly examined points and formulas. It is not meant to be comprehensive and does not replace the need for detailed study of the CFA Curriculum.IMPORTANT: Required Screen Size is minimum 1,280 x 720 pixels e.g. Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy S3/S4 otherwise some text may not fit on your screen.Search keywords: CFA, Chartered Financial Analyst* CFAÂ® and Chartered Financial AnalystÂ® are registered trademarks of CFA Institute.** This application is not affiliated with, sponsored or approved by CFA Institute.

reviews.title: Many spelling errors
reviews.comment: Not sure how much I can trust the information if they dont even spend the time to run a spell check on the info in the app.
reviews.author: Ryan Alsop
